meanings.definition: A book with blank pages for writing notes.
meanings.sent1: I always carry a notebook to jot down important information.
meanings.sent2: She opened her notebook and began writing her thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The notebook looked sad because it had no words written on its pages.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a notebook, filled with memories and stories.
meanings.sent5: The notebook lay open, waiting for the ink to bring it to life.

meanings.definition: A small computer that is easy to carry around.
meanings.sent1: He uses his notebook for work while traveling.
meanings.sent2: The sleek design of the notebook makes it convenient for on-the-go tasks.
meanings.sent3: The notebook beeped happily when he turned it on.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, the notebook was a gateway to endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The notebook hummed softly, ready to assist with any task.
